website_summaries.verdict: Speckles loves to dance, and she's easy to spot with her purple and white markings and sweet dance moves.
pros: Light-up eyes change colors with Speckles' mood
Expresses up to 50 reactions when nose or touch sensors are pressed
Use twist-lock tail to attach to handbag, purse, or arm
cons: Tail is difficult to keep wrapped around your arm

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: It is so cute soooooooo cute. i love it! it's fun to play with for kids and adults !💖💖💗🐱 its so fluffy and soft!!💚💙💚💜 I totally recommend this! For anyone😉 It moves and sings and talks. It's eyes are sparkly and the eyes change color by its feeling just like a hatchamal! So cute
customer_reviews.author: Jkkbaum

customer_reviews.title: Amazon Warehouse is awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this through Amazon Warehouse; great price, looked brand new; happily surprised daughter...Win-Win!!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute and inexpensive
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2. The pink one stopped working within an hour. The purple one, however, is great. Make sure you save the paper in the package so you can decipher what it wants. When its eyes turn yellow it is hungry etc. Used for several days and still on the original batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Pepper

customer_reviews.title: SUPER CUTE!!!😀❤💙💚💛💜😁😉
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of them for my daughter and I didn't like the last one so we returned it but the second one is definitely cuter.
customer_reviews.author: Laura R.

customer_reviews.title: Just as pictured.
customer_reviews.text: Cute, but it doesn't really wrap and stay that well on things. Also, pay attention to the age. I thought it would be ok for my 3 year old, but it scared her.
customer_reviews.author: MomOf3

customer_reviews.title: 2018 Top Pick Toy
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my granddaughter after learning it was a "top-pick" hot toy for 2018, and were they ever right! Quoting a five- (5) year old.... "BEST birthday present EVER Grammie!!" Adorable interactive pet kitty, and I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Davi

customer_reviews.title: Disappoined
customer_reviews.text: I just received the box and found one of the three in an opened plastic bag. The other two had sealed plastic bags. Only one worked using the sample button. Not exactly happy with opening the remaining two to replace batteries since they are supposed to be gifts. I likely will have to return or exchange. I wish I had simply purchased these items at the local store instead.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. B

customer_reviews.title: Little Friend
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift, she enjoyed it. The more you play with it the more that it interacts
customer_reviews.author: Mamajen

customer_reviews.title: Cute kids toy
customer_reviews.text: There's not much that this toy does, but it works as advertised. It's very cute, and my daughter loves it. Worth the money. She loves that the tail holds shape and she can wear it around her arm.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Arrived damaged
customer_reviews.text: Very cute but I don't think it's working properly, and the packaging arrived damaged, this was a gift for my neice. The battery included was dead, the try me mode was not working. The instructions say you can touch other key areas for different responses, but nothing works except the nose....? Like most little kids, she didn't want to give this gift up to wait for an exchange, she thought it was very cute but wished it did more, which I believe it's supposed to do much more than what the one we received actually does.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: It is just as adorable as I expected
customer_reviews.text: It is just as adorable as I expected. I can't wait to give it to my granddaughter for her birthday.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Berry

customer_reviews.title: Freeze dance mode does not work
customer_reviews.text: The Pomsie is very cute but i am very dissapointed cause the freeze dance mode does not work. This toy was a gift for christmas and my giró was very dissapointed. I live outside the USA and the cost for replace returning the pomsie y higer than the pomsie. What can i do??
customer_reviews.author: SROM

customer_reviews.title: Kid loved it
customer_reviews.text: My 3yr old daughter loved it. I bought 3 just in case her cousin and half sister wanted one.
customer_reviews.author: Mls

customer_reviews.title: Cute toy
customer_reviews.text: Have not given these to the kids yet. Will be for Christmas. But they sure are cute, and they do talk. I think it’s a win.
customer_reviews.author: kathy golden

customer_reviews.title: Cute for a reader, not worth $15.
customer_reviews.text: The fur seemed really raggedy looking like we rescued this fur ball from the streets. I spent $15 on this and now I see its $9.45, and I have seen it as low as $5 on other sites. I should’ve waited to purchase it at a discount. It’s a bit hard to learn how to use, unless you can read over the multiple features again and again. Also, the tail doesn’t stay wrapped around your wrist like advertised.
customer_reviews.author: MyLuv115

customer_reviews.title: A Companion
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these for my kids recently to sleep with or just play with.They love them and struggle to let go of them. The eyes light up and it makes noises which in general is great but at times (1am) the sounds can wake up the kids (push the nose). As a whole they are fun, very usable and giftable and I think a wonderful toy.
customer_reviews.author: Start Up Guy

customer_reviews.title: Item came just as imagined
customer_reviews.text: It's a Christmas gift but the item was delivered on time and no defects. It looks so cute. Can't wait til my 6yo little girl opens it.
customer_reviews.author: Alena

customer_reviews.title: Meh.
customer_reviews.text: It’s whatever. Kind of like a cuter version of a Furby. My girls were excited to get them for Christmas and then within about 2 days were completely disinterested and couldn’t care less about them. They make some noises and come with a brush and you can twist them to wear them on your wrist.
customer_reviews.author: Ali Brown

customer_reviews.title: Depends on what your kids like!
customer_reviews.text: This excited my baby.. but my toddler was a little scared at first.. seeing the colored eyes.. the sound is not that great..becomes little tiring if played on Again and again..did not find it too soft.. it may get dirty soon.. okay to try for this price once to see if the kids like it
customer_reviews.author: Mitt

customer_reviews.title: Received broken!!
customer_reviews.text: Stay away from product! I purchased this as a Christmas gift for my daughter and didn’t notice until she opened it that it was broken. Not only was it broken, but smelled like mouse feces. She was so disappointed on Christmas morning. I should have opened it before I wrapped it
customer_reviews.author: Katie Gaughan

customer_reviews.title: Pomsies
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves her Lavender Pomsies Kitten. She has been walking around with it for a week. It does make noise but not loud enough to bug adults. Very cute toy. Came fast and very happy with the quality for the price I paid. I would purchase another for a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Susan's Thoughts

customer_reviews.title: Yes
customer_reviews.text: Every toddler & little kid I know loves these things. They’re not super loud, they’re cute, they surprisingly have quite a few features.. only downfall is that the batteries die kind of fast if they use it everyday.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Priced reasonably
customer_reviews.text: Pomsies are one of the hot toys this holiday season. Since this toy is easily manipulated it is great for younger children, as well as older. The promise can easily be wrapped around your wrist and carried around just as a “stuffed animal” or it can be turned on and interacted with. It is usually reasonably priced around $15.
customer_reviews.author: Dana P

customer_reviews.title: Bought for my niece
customer_reviews.text: Not as great as I thought it would be. Supposed to be for kids and will not wrap tight enough on their wrist to stay up right. Touch sensitivity is great though but a disappointment to my niece when it wouldn’t stay up right.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa

customer_reviews.title: Glitches within hours of first time use.
customer_reviews.text: My daughters (ages 6 and 3) received these from "Santa" at Christmas and by the end of the day both toys no longer worked well, they "glitched" and sounded horrible. We replaced them both, thinking perhaps they were too rough on them or that maybe the package had been roughed up in the mail. But it happened AGAIN within 2 days! Will never waste money on these again and will discourage others from wasting theirs.
customer_reviews.author: Rachelle

customer_reviews.title: Not indestructable
customer_reviews.text: Our oldest granddaughter is tough on everything. She managed to destroy it in 6 months, but it endured with her that long. It is a quality toy and worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Steven D. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Precious little toy
customer_reviews.text: An adorable toy I'm well over 55 & I hi had to have one it annoys my car tho...lol worth every penny!!
customer_reviews.author: Miss D

customer_reviews.title: Just fine
customer_reviews.text: It’s cute and good quality. Was worried with all the negative reviews. My seven year old didn’t look twice at it but her three and five year old siblings love it 😹
customer_reviews.author: A Jacobson

customer_reviews.title: We are happy.
customer_reviews.text: My niece loves it. She has not put in down since she got it.
customer_reviews.author: Benne Marble

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my daughter and she loves it! It makes noises and even purrs. I really like how the tail will let you wrap it around your hand. The eyes turn colors depending on its mood and has solar entertained my child... and our dog!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Nicole Wheeler

customer_reviews.title: Awesome toy!!!
customer_reviews.text: We LOVE it!!! Speckles is adorable. My 3 1/ 2 year old loves this wonderfully interactive cat toy!!! I highly recommend it and especially for the price. Great buy!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: All-around fun toy for my daughter she thought it was perfect for Christmas. I can’t tell you how fast she ripped open the package and saw that it was a Pomsie.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Great for a 4yo
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 4 year old niece for Christmas. Word from my sister is she’s obsessed with it. I didn’t realize it was interactive and was surprised that at this price point that was a feature. Verdict - I’m an awesome aunt.
customer_reviews.author: Kat O

customer_reviews.title: Adorable plushies
customer_reviews.text: They are absolutely adorable. I ordered 3 in different colors for my great-nieces for Christmas 2018 which, as of this review date of 11/28/18, Christmas is not yet here.
customer_reviews.author: Denna

customer_reviews.title: My grand daughter did not know that this would be her favorite toy!
customer_reviews.text: She fell in love with it right away. Then it started to coo and eyes lit up and changes color and has different reaction to assorted senses. She barely put it down all night.
customer_reviews.author: Rick L.

customer_reviews.title: The best gift!
customer_reviews.text: These are now my go to gift for kids! These cost twice the price in stores and are absolutely adorable!!
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: 6yo loves it
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my 6yo who enjoys stuff toys like this. She was excited to get it and play with it.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Awesome toy, dead batteries
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my neighbors daughter for Easter. She absolutely loved it. But after a few hours of playing with it it died. She was very upset because she thought she broke it. Turns out the batteries were dead. You should let your customer know they need to get batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Eloise McHughes

customer_reviews.title: Cute toy
customer_reviews.text: My daughter (8) received one from her Grandma and loved it. Pressing the nose turns it on. Eyes light up and it sings and says different things. Tail can be wound around a wrist or whatever you choose. Comes with a brush. Batteries are included. Holding the nose will turn it off.
customer_reviews.author: Manhattan Mom

customer_reviews.title: Fun for a 5 year old.
customer_reviews.text: Okay. Fun and playful for a 5 year old. However, this does not wrap around wrist or ankle and stay like the photos show. Falls off of her no matter what we try.
customer_reviews.author: Luna Lover

customer_reviews.title: Boring
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 6 year old daughter, and she’s not really interested in it. It’s cute but doesn’t hold her attention. Also tail does not stay on anything you wrap it around.
customer_reviews.author: Jcl

customer_reviews.title: Broke after one hour
customer_reviews.text: Defective. This was a gift from “santa”. I have one disappointed kiddo on Christmas Day and now have to deal with returning it.
customer_reviews.author: mandy milstead

customer_reviews.title: Alternative Pet
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves her pomsie. It purrs like a cat and toots. Lol It will say your child’s name.
customer_reviews.author: Donne Compton

customer_reviews.title: Super cute
customer_reviews.text: Cute. My daughter loves it. She is two about to be three. The color is cute. It's not to loud. It was on the top toy list. And it was a good price. Good buy we are happy
customer_reviews.author: Giovanni S. Perrone

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: the item has been received, the item is good and satisfied with the service

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!
customer_reviews.text: So cute! Perfect for anyone under 8. My nieces loved these because of the beautiful eyes and interactive engagement. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: Did not last long
customer_reviews.text: It stopped working after a month the nose would no longer press in to activate the talking. My granddaughter loved it so for the price I am going to try another one.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Expensive
customer_reviews.text: These are annoying and expensive for what they are. My kids however saved up their money for one because they were in love the second they saw it.
customer_reviews.author: Kendra Ficek

customer_reviews.title: Everything is super.
customer_reviews.text: Everything is super. Got the whole. And this is 100% original product. We will dig more! Thank you very much
customer_reviews.author: Artem Lysak

customer_reviews.title: Didn't look good but was easy to fix
customer_reviews.text: It looked a little destroyed as it arrived. I combed it with a little brush and it looks ok again. Its going to be a Christmas present, so I dont know yet how it works.
customer_reviews.author: Super

customer_reviews.title: DOA
customer_reviews.text: Arrived dead. Replaced batteries. Still dead. Big Santa flop. Waste of five bucks 🙄

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter turns two this week and I gave this to her as an early gift (as I couldn’t wait for her to open it. She loves kitties). She loves this toy! It’s really cute and I like how you can interact with it.
customer_reviews.author: Taylerthor

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 1 month
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my Granddaughter and stopped working after about 4 weeks. Changed battery and still didn't work. She was very disappointed. And so am I.
customer_reviews.author: Janice M

customer_reviews.title: Fun little toy, not as interactive as I expected.
customer_reviews.text: Very cute, but hard to follow for a Toddler. Got it as a Christmas gift for her, but she did love brushing it's hair. Fun little toy!
customer_reviews.author: The Dawg Lady

customer_reviews.title: Very cute and worth it
customer_reviews.text: My daughter actually liked this one does a bunch of different things. Gets hungry gets hickups wants to be tickled gets sick farts lol. Especially like the dance mode it changes songs based on the speed of your dancing and tells you when to freeze just like freeze dance as a kid but no stereo needed.

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my granddaughter for Christmas. Cute toy. Reminds my of the Furbies ( I think that was the name) from years ago.

customer_reviews.title: Giftable toy
customer_reviews.text: Cute interactive toy. It’s soft and holds up to use.

customer_reviews.title: My little sister hasn’t put it down since Christmas!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my little sister and she has not put it down since she got it so I would say it is a very highly recommended item!

customer_reviews.title: Fast Delivery
customer_reviews.text: It was a Christmas gift. The recipient was ecstatic. Just want they wanted. Like always fast delivery.

customer_reviews.title: Squashed

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Great gift, still being used 6 months later by the recipient (4year old girl)

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: The toy is easy to use and carry, perfect for my little girl who cuddles with something all day long.

customer_reviews.title: Loveable and adorable
customer_reviews.text: I bought Pomsies for all of my nieces and kids' friends. They are loveable and adorable.

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves it!
customer_reviews.text: It is a pretty toy that does what it says!

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Christmas gift
customer_reviews.text: Out of all the neat things that my 4 year old got for Christmas, this turned out to be her favorite.

customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old likes this toy but the noises it makes are obnoxious and I grew tired of hearing it very quickly.

customer_reviews.title: Fun and colorful toy
customer_reviews.text: Kids loved it. I bought a few of them for children ages 3-10. All enjoyed the adoreable Pomsies .

product_meta.title: Pomsies 1884 Speckles Plush Interactive Toys, One Size, Purple/Lavender
product_meta.description: Pomsies are loveable, fashionable, interactive pom Pom pets You can take anywhere. Each pomsie has soft, cuddly fur and a tail that wraps around your wrist, hair, clothing and more! Pomsies are loveable, fashionable, interactive pom Pom pets You can take anywhere. Each pomsie has soft, cuddly fur and a tail that wraps around your wrist, hair, clothing and more!
feature_bullets: Pomsies will tell you when they feel tired, cold or Hungry with adorable light up eyes, purring and cute sounds…only you can give them what they need!
Take it to a new level with a special freeze dance mode you can Play with you and your friends!
Reacts to touch! Light up eyes communicate how they feel!
Touch sensors – pet them, hug them, love them. Over 50 cute sounds!
Twist and lock tail - a great accessory for your backpack, wrist, hair and more!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars653 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
